name: One Time Detective (GameJam)
description:
Made for the Game Parade Summer 2021 GameJam.

It's very  basic at the moment.  One scenario available.

Find the killer in the mansion of people.  You have a gun with a single bullet.  You have one chance to get this right.  Find clues and talk to some suspects.  Normal detective work.  Because you're totally a normal detective.  You have 5 minutes before the killer finds out you only have one bullet and kills you.  Then proceeds to kill everyone else.

You're their last hope.
